lines: Per aspera ad astra!
Yes, you mastered all levels.
I hope it's been as entertaining playing
the game as it was for me creating it.
My gratitude goes to my informal beta
testers Peter and Sebastian:
Thank you!
The game is using the fantastic planck.js
library - the rest is vanilla code.
All sound is Creative Commons licensed.
The effects were taken from freesound.org,
the ending soundtrack from soundcloud.org
Please check the repository for details:
https://github.com/smurf667/zzzone
Of course the game has its roots in the
immortal C64 game Thrust. It will put
a smile on anyone old enough to remember.
If you like this game...
Please spread the word!
Press space to start all over
or enjoy the wild soundtrack...
